abstract: The chief executive of Amazon.com says his company’s handling of the George Orwell e-book recall was “stupid, thoughtless and painfully out of line with our principles”
snippet: The chief executive of Amazon.com says his company’s handling of the George Orwell e-book recall was “stupid, thoughtless and painfully out of line with our principles”
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com was widely criticized last week for deleting electronic copies of George Orwell’s novels from its customers’ Kindle readers after it discovered that it had inadvertently sold unauthorized editions of the books.

headline.main: Amazon Chief Says Erasing Orwell Books Was ‘Stupid’
